_header: The man that is of woman I-bore

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞE Mon þat is of wommon I boreHis lyf nis heere but a
                    þrowe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines: …Graunt vs alle his blessyngAMEN AMEN par charite
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: A Tretys of þreo messagers of deþ (see 1945)

          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
ÞE mon þat is of wommon I boreHis lyf nis here but a
                    þrowe…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þat here sitteþ in TriniteGraunte vs alle his
                    blessyngAmen. Amen par Charite
